email.description: The email address of the user as configured in TestRail

id.description: The unique ID of the user

is_active.description: True if the user is active and false otherwise

name.description: The full name of the user

role.description: The Name of the user’s globally assigned role (Requires TestRail 6.4 or later)

role_id.description: The unique ID of the user’s globally assigned role (Requires TestRail 6.4 or later)
